subject: Steroids
Doping (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Gene Orza, the baseball union’s chief operating officer, said on Monday that he did not tip off Alex Rodriguez to a drug test at the end of the 2004 season.
snippet: Gene Orza, the baseball union’s chief operating officer, said on Monday that he did not tip off Alex Rodriguez to a drug test at the end of the 2004 season.
